Package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config

Interface DbConfig

All Superinterfaces:
org.aeonbits.owner.Config, io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig, Serializable
@LoadPolicy(MERGE) @Sources({"system:properties","classpath:${db.config.file}.properties"}) public interface DbConfig extends io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig
Configuration interface for database connection settings.

This interface uses the OWNER library to load database configuration properties from system properties or a specified configuration file.

Author:
Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª

  • Method Details

    • projectPackages

      @Key("project.packages") @Separator(";") String[] projectPackages()
      Retrieves the base Java package for your project.

      Used by reflection utilities to scan for entity classes and database hooks under the specified root package.

      Returns:
      the root package name of the application code

    • type

      @ConverterClass(DbTypeConverter.class) @Key("db.default.type") DbType<?> type()
      Retrieves the default database type.

      Determines which DbType implementation (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) is used to configure connections and dialect behavior.

      Returns:
      the configured DbType for the default database

    • host

      @Key("db.default.host") String host()
      Retrieves the default database host.
      Returns:
      The hostname or IP address of the database.

    • port

      @Key("db.default.port") Integer port()
      Retrieves the default database port.
      Returns:
      The port number used for database connections.

    • name

      @Key("db.default.name") String name()
      Retrieves the default database name.
      Returns:
      The name of the database.

    • username

      @Key("db.default.username") String username()
      Retrieves the default database username.
      Returns:
      The username used for authentication.

    • password

      @Key("db.default.password") String password()
      Retrieves the default database password.
      Returns:
      The password used for authentication.

    • fullConnectionString

      @Key("db.full.connection.string") String fullConnectionString()
      Retrieves the full JDBC connection string for the database.

      If provided, this URL will be used directly to establish connections, overriding the individual host, port, and name properties.

      Returns:
      the complete JDBC URL, or null if not set
